attributes.action: Restore UKTV History to its rightful position on Freeview
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As of 15th October 2007 Freeview channel 12 will only host UKTV History between the hours of 0700 and 1800.
We demand that it is restored to its rightful place. There is far too much vacuous TV out there and we believe this is another example of dumbing down by stealth.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
